effect.scarlet-violet: Uses another move chosen according to the terrain. Terrain | Selected move ------------------------- | ------------------ Building | tri attack Cave | rock slide Deep water | hydro pump Desert | earthquake Grass | seed bomb Mountain | rock slide Road | earthquake Shallow water | hydro pump Snow | blizzard Tall grass | seed bomb electric terrain | thunderbolt grassy terrain | energy ball misty terrain | moonblast In Pokémon Battle Revolution: Terrain | Selected move -------------- | ------------------ Courtyard | tri attack Crystal | rock slide Gateway | hydro pump Magma | rock slide Main Street | tri attack Neon | tri attack Stargazer | rock slide Sunny Park | seed bomb Sunset | earthquake Waterfall | seed bomb This move cannot be copied by mirror move.
